text: Attila Béla Ladislau Kelemen (4 May 1948 – 8 January 2022), better known as Attila B. L. Kelemen, was a Romanian politician. He was a Member of the European Parliament in 2007. He was a member of the Democratic Alliance of Hungarians in Romania (UDMR/RMDSZ). Kelemen has also sat in the Chamber of Deputies from 1996 to 2016. Kelemen was born in Târgu Mureş, Romania. He died on 8 January 2022 in Paris, France, at the age of 73.Doliu în UDMR. A murit Attila Kelemen, fost deputat timp de 20 ani în Parlamentul României ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:MEPs for Romania
title: Attila Kelemen
